metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1280 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A use-after-free vulnerability was found in drm_lease_held in drivers/gpu/drm/drm_lease.c in the Linux kernel due to a race problem. This flaw allows a local user privilege attacker to cause a denial of service (DoS) or a kernel information leak.
